item.title: Useful hints for Endnote
item.description: ðŸ’¡ A collection of hints for working with Endnote this is a working document primarily addressed at students from the Institute of Nursing Science at University of Basel and may change over time - feedback welcome Q: Endnote does not find/download articles with full-text search? A: First, have you a installed a functioning licences version of Endnote? Check in your asknet [dot] unibas [dot] ch-account. Second, probably you need to install the connection, for instance the Wiley Online Library - instruction are posted here: https://endnote.
